Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.io.events.IOError

  • Packages that use IOError 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.http
    Provides components for building a HTTP server based on the core and IO components.
    org.jgrapes.io.events
    Provides the events used by the I/O related components.
    org.jgrapes.net
    Networking related I/O classes.

    • Uses of IOError in org.jgrapes.http

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void HttpConnector.onIoError​(IOError event)
      Handles I/O error events from the network layer.

      Subclasses of IOError in org.jgrapes.io.events 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ConnectError
      Indicates a problem while opening a network connection.
      Constructors in org.jgrapes.io.events with parameters of type IOError 
      Constructor Description
      IOError​(IOError event)

    • Uses of IOError in org.jgrapes.net

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void SslCodec.onIOError​(IOError event, IOSubchannel encryptedChannel)
      Handles an IOError event from the encrypted channel (client) by sending it downstream.
